instance.name: Plugins
instance.description: Space-separated list of TinyMCE plugins to enable. See https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/plugins/ for more information on plugins.
instance.default: advcode table autoresize textpattern lists advlist media mediaembed powerpaste image anchor link help

instance.name: Toolbar
instance.description: Specify your toolbar configuration here. To use the default toolbar, clear this field. To hide the toolbar, enter the value 'false'. See https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/configure/editor-appearance/#toolbar
instance.default: bold italic underline | alignleft aligncenter alignright alignjustify | numlist bullist outdent indent | anchor link image assetUpload | removeformat code

instance.name: Menubar
instance.description: Specify the menus to display here. To use the default menu bar, clear this field. To hide the menu, enter the value 'false'. See https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/configure/editor-appearance/#menubar
instance.default: edit format insert table view help
